meanings.definition: People who are passionate about something.
meanings.sent1: The passionals in the group always bring so much energy and excitement.
meanings.sent2: She is one of the passionals who truly care about making a difference.
meanings.sent3: The passionals in the book club never run out of things to discuss.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the fire of the passionals when she talked about her favorite hobby.
meanings.sent5: The passionals in the room could be heard cheering loudly for their team.

meanings.definition: Showing strong emotions or intense feelings.
meanings.sent1: Her passionate speech moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent2: The passionate artist poured their heart into every brushstroke.
meanings.sent3: The passionate chef's dishes were always bursting with flavor.
meanings.sent4: The passionate colors of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: His passionate love for music was evident in every note he played.

meanings.definition: To engage in activities with great enthusiasm or fervor.
meanings.sent1: They passionaled their way through the dance competition, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: She passionals about her job, always giving her best effort.
meanings.sent3: The kids passionaled around the playground, laughing and playing.
meanings.sent4: He passionaled through the marathon, crossing the finish line with a big smile.
meanings.sent5: The team passionaled their way to victory, celebrating their hard-earned win.
